name: Spaceland
detailed_description:
Get ready for a turn-based tactical adventure. Lead your team of space rangers, discover secrets of the uncharted planet, defeat alien monsters, follow the story and upgrade your heroes with new weapons and futuristic gear.

Inspired by old-school strategies

Spaceland is a turn-based strategy in old-school style. Inspired by XCOM, Laser Squad, Incubation and gorgeous classical sci-fi novels.

Fast tactical battles

Fast paced 10-15 minutes long battles. Eliminate dangerous inhabitants of the strange planet. Invulnerable brontors, fast creepers, mutants and more. And, last but not least, face the cunning bosses at the end of each story chapter

Space adventure

Find out hidden details about your characters in various dialogues on your spaceship. Search secret drones on levels and fill your in-game encyclopedia with scientific secrets of the base.

Futuristic gear for your squad

Lead your team and outsmart your enemy. Find weaponary and equip your squad with futuristic gear.

short_description: Tactical adventure inspired by XCOM and legendary sci-fi novels. Lead team of space rangers, outsmart alien monsters and discover secrets of uncharted planet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core with x64 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 550 or AMD Radeon HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core with x64 support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 760 or AMD Radeon R9
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
